definitions: depending on or relating to the circumstances that form the setting for an event, statement, or idea

examples.text: he included contextual information in footnotes

shortDefinitions: depending or relating to circumstances around event etc.

definitions: depending on the preceding or following parts of a text to clarify meaning

examples.text: they have limited practice in working out the meaning of unfamiliar material from contextual clues

shortDefinitions: depending on preceding or following parts of text to clarify meaning
